 适用于 Raspberry Pi 和 PC 的开源数字标牌解决方案</h1><a id="user-content-----anthias--------open-source-digital-signage-solution-for-raspberry-pi-and-pc" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：
 安西亚斯
 ·

<p dir="auto"><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://github.com/Screenly/Anthias/blob/master/static/img/color.svg?raw=true"><img src="https://github.com/Screenly/Anthias/raw/master/static/img/color.svg?raw=true" alt="Anthias 标志" title="Anthias Logo" style="max-width: 100%;" _mstalt="175461" _msthash="381"></a></p>
<br>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto" _msttexthash="5555355" _msthash="382">✨ 关于 Anthias</h2><a id="user-content-sparkles-about-anthias" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接： ：sparkles： 关于 Anthias" href="#sparkles-about-anthias" _mstaria-label="939965" _msthash="383"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto" _msttexthash="1486487457" _msthash="384">Anthias 是适用于 Raspberry Pi 设备和 PC 的数字标牌平台。前身为 Screenly OSE，为了消除 Screenly（付费版本）和 Anthias 之间的混淆，它已更名。更多详细信息可以在<a href="https://www.screenly.io/blog/2022/12/06/screenly-ose-now-called-anthias/" rel="nofollow" _istranslated="1">这篇博文</a>中找到。</p>
<p dir="auto" _msttexthash="132974816" _msthash="385">想帮助 Anthias 茁壮成长吗？使用 <a href="https://github.com/sponsors/Screenly" _istranslated="1">GitHub Sponsor</a> 支持我们。</p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto" _msttexthash="16795077" _msthash="386">🚀 开始</h2><a id="user-content-rocket-getting-started" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接： ：rocket： 入门" href="#rocket-getting-started" _mstaria-label="945685" _msthash="387"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto" _msttexthash="141881324" _msthash="388">有关如何安装 Anthias 的选项，请参阅<a href="/Screenly/Anthias/blob/master/docs/installation-options.md" _istranslated="1">此页面</a>。</p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto" _msttexthash="9025666" _msthash="389">✅ 兼容性</h2><a id="user-content-white_check_mark-compatibility" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接： ：white_check_mark： 兼容性" href="#white_check_mark-compatibility" _mstaria-label="1472575" _msthash="390"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto" _msttexthash="239895305" _msthash="391">我们已经对 Anthias 进行了测试，已知它可以在以下平台上运行：</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li _msttexthash="43590248" _msthash="392">Raspberry Pi 4 Model B - 32 位和 64 位 Bullseye、64 位 Bookworm</li>
<li _msttexthash="44863416" _msthash="393">Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ - 32 位和 64 位 Bullseye、64 位 Bookworm</li>
<li _msttexthash="19012734" _msthash="394">Raspberry Pi 3 Model B - 64 位 Bookworm 和 Bullseye</li>
<li _msttexthash="22420645" _msthash="395">Raspberry Pi 2 B 型 - 32 位 Bookworm 和 Bullseye</li>
<li><font _mstmutation="1" _msttexthash="35919104" _msthash="396">PC（x86 设备）- 64 位 Bookworm</font><ul dir="auto">
<li _msttexthash="67567162" _msthash="397">这些设备可以类似于 NUC 迷你电脑。</li>
<li _msttexthash="287451086" _msthash="398">有关如何以特定方式安装 Debian 的说明，请参阅<a href="/Screenly/Anthias/blob/master/docs/x86-installation.md" _istranslated="1">此</a>页
在运行<a href="/Screenly/Anthias/blob/master/docs/installation-options.md#installing-on-raspberry-pi-os-lite-or-debian" _istranslated="1">安装脚本</a>之前。</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<div class="markdown-alert markdown-alert-note" dir="auto"><p class="markdown-alert-title" dir="auto"><svg class="octicon octicon-info mr-2" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M0 8a8 8 0 1 1 16 0A8 8 0 0 1 0 8Zm8-6.5a6.5 6.5 0 1 0 0 13 6.5 6.5 0 0 0 0-13ZM6.5 7.75A.75.75 0 0 1 7.25 7h1a.75.75 0 0 1 .75.75v2.75h.25a.75.75 0 0 1 0 1.5h-2a.75.75 0 0 1 0-1.5h.25v-2h-.25a.75.75 0 0 1-.75-.75ZM8 6a1 1 0 1 1 0-2 1 1 0 0 1 0 2Z"></path></svg><font _mstmutation="1" _msttexthash="5121168" _msthash="399">注意</font></p><p dir="auto" _msttexthash="813655713" _msthash="400">我们仍在修复安装程序，以便它可以与 Raspberry Pi Zero 和 Raspberry Pi 1 一起使用。
如果您遇到任何问题，请在此存储库或<a href="https://forums.screenly.io" rel="nofollow" _istranslated="1">论坛</a>中提交问题。</p>
</div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto" _msttexthash="8027526" _msthash="401">⭐ Star 历史</h2><a id="user-content-star-star-history" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接： ：star： Star History" href="#star-star-history" _mstaria-label="715234" _msthash="402"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto"><a href="https://star-history.com/#Screenly/Anthias&amp;Date" rel="nofollow"><img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e9715964ad5f987e7b4b15002f19092ad933b7952f06cad24b84d03670898884/68747470733a2f2f6170692e737461722d686973746f72792e636f6d2f7376673f7265706f733d53637265656e6c792f416e746869617326747970653d44617465" alt="Star 历史图表" data-canonical-src="https://api.star-history.com/svg?repos=Screenly/Anthias&amp;type=Date" style="max-width: 100%;" _mstalt="315991" _msthash="403"></a></p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto" _msttexthash="35570444" _msthash="404">🐞 问题和错误</h2><a id="user-content-lady_beetle-issues-and-bugs" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接： ：lady_beetle： 问题和错误" href="#lady_beetle-issues-and-bugs" _mstaria-label="1153854" _msthash="405"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="markdown-alert markdown-alert-note" dir="auto"><p class="markdown-alert-title" dir="auto"><svg class="octicon octicon-info mr-2" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M0 8a8 8 0 1 1 16 0A8 8 0 0 1 0 8Zm8-6.5a6.5 6.5 0 1 0 0 13 6.5 6.5 0 0 0 0-13ZM6.5 7.75A.75.75 0 0 1 7.25 7h1a.75.75 0 0 1 .75.75v2.75h.25a.75.75 0 0 1 0 1.5h-2a.75.75 0 0 1 0-1.5h.25v-2h-.25a.75.75 0 0 1-.75-.75ZM8 6a1 1 0 1 1 0-2 1 1 0 0 1 0 2Z"></path></svg><font _mstmutation="1" _msttexthash="5121168" _msthash="406">注意</font></p><p dir="auto" _msttexthash="343031767" _msthash="407">我们仍在消除一些错误。您可以<a href="https://github.com/Screenly/Anthias/issues" _istranslated="1">在此处</a>跟踪已知问题。您还可以在 <a href="https://forums.screenly.io" rel="nofollow" _istranslated="1">Anthias 论坛</a>中查看讨论。</p>
</div>
